sources.title: The Paperboy (2012) - Full Movie
sources.description:
In this star-studded crime drama, Matthew McConaughey (""Dallas Buyers Club"") stars as a reporter who returns to his Florida hometown to investigate a case involving a death row inmate. Featuring Zac Efron and Nicole Kidman.

#matthewmcconaughey #zacefron #thriller #drama #crime #freemovie #fullmovie #action

metadata.Plot: Eldest son Ward Jansen is a star reporter for a Miami newspaper and has returned home with close friend Yardley to investigate a racial murder case. Younger brother Jack Jansen has returned home after a failed stint at university as a star swimmer. To help give his life some direction, Ward gives Jack a job on their investigation as their driver. But into the mix comes the fianc√©e of the imprisoned convict who stirs up confusing feelings of love and lust for the young Jack. Meanwhile, Ward and Yardley's investigation stirs up deep-rooted issues of race and acceptance which could cause serious consequences for everyone involved.
metadata.Actors: Matthew McConaughey, Nicole Kidman, John Cusack
